actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Small Business.

actions.subcommittee: SBA & SBIC Authority, Minority Enterprise, and General Small Business Problems
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on SBA & SBIC Authority, Minority Enterprise, and General Small Business Problems.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on SBA and SBIC Authority, Minority Enterprise, and General Small Business

official_title: A bill to amend the Small Business Act to provide that prior law provisions relating to interest rates on disaster loans shall continue to apply to disasters occurring in States with high unemployment.

summary.text: Amends the Small Business Act to provide that the interest rate on disaster loans made by the Small Business Administration shall apply to loans made with respect to disasters occurring after August 12, 1981, in States with high unemployment.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Small Business Act to provide that prior law provisions relating to interest rates on disaster loans shall continue to apply to disasters occurring in States with high unemployment.
